name: Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik
name_original: Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik
description:
Attention we are responsible for this game 16+ because there is a blood suicide difficulty of boss levels when destroying also has a number of 109 levels.

Super Vadimka II Revenge of Dr. Kulik - this is a typical pltaformer created by. VadimBallzGame, who himself made so many levels of boss, traps - in the game you have to send the dangerous ones again, also throw them to kill  - enemies, and then the horror begins in the 5th world, you have to collect the - keys to try to stick to the wall, we accidentally make such games well, this game can harm a, child in the game there is a demonic creature attacking. Vadim Kulev in the 3rd world.

For the intelligent how to play Super Vadimka 2 / management

left + right 2 times + space ctrl - when the wall is close, you can hold it from the top to the top of the mountain.

Ctrl + space acceleration.

Crtl pulls out - throws objects at enemies about enemies do not throw keys the door will be open.
